short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply EU privacy to your browser
short.fr: Applique les règles de vie privée de l'Union Européenne à votre navigateur

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The EU law grants you to preserve your privacy while browsing online. Act now and add the EU Privacy Extension to your browser. This extension will block data leakage from scripts and other cookies. Download a preset ruleset (we have two and the community can make its own) and you are ready to browse the Internet without letting everyone knows what you do.
